titleStmt.title: By the Lord Lieutenant General, and General Governour of Ireland Ormonde. Whereas we are informed, that divers officers of His Majesties army in this kingdom do absent themselves from their respective commands without our licence, ...
Proclamations. 1664-05-27.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Crooke, printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, and are to be sold by Sam. Dancer, bookseller in Castle-street,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at His Majesties Castle of Dublin, the 27. day of May, 1664.".
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Ireland.
